verses.text: \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* was pleased \w to|strong="H1868"\w* put over \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* a hundred \w and|strong="H4437"\w* twenty captains, who were \w to|strong="H1868"\w* be all through \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*;

\w And|strong="H4437"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* them \w were|strong="H1934"\w* three chief rulers, \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* Daniel \w was|strong="H1934"\w* one; \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* captains \w were|strong="H1934"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* responsible \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* chief rulers, \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* king might undergo no loss.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* this \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* did \w his|strong="H1768"\w* work better \w than|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* chief rulers \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* captains, \w because|strong="H4481"\w* \w there|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w a|strong="H2298"\w* special spirit \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w him|strong="H3052"\w*; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* it \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* king's purpose \w to|strong="H4481"\w* put \w him|strong="H3052"\w* \w over|strong="H5924"\w* all \w the|strong="H1768"\w* kingdom.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* chief rulers \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* captains \w were|strong="H1934"\w* looking \w for|strong="H1768"\w* some cause \w for|strong="H1768"\w* putting \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* wrong \w in|strong="H4437"\w* connection \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, \w but|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* unable \w to|strong="H5922"\w* put forward \w any|strong="H3606"\w* wrongdoing \w or|strong="H4430"\w* error \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w*; \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* true, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* no error \w or|strong="H4430"\w* wrong \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* seen \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* these men said, \w We|strong="H0116"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* only get \w a|strong="H7912"\w* reason \w for|strong="H1768"\w* attacking \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w in|strong="H4437"\w* connection \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* law \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* God.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w these|strong="H0479"\w* chief rulers \w and|strong="H1841"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* captains came \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* king \w and|strong="H1841"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* him, O King Darius, have life \w for|strong="H1768"\w* ever.

\w All|strong="H5957"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* chief rulers \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* kingdom, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* chiefs \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* captains, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* wise men \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* rulers, \w have|strong="H4430"\w* made \w a|strong="H0116"\w* common decision \w to|strong="H5922"\w* put \w in|strong="H5922"\w* force \w a|strong="H0116"\w* law having \w the|strong="H0116"\w* king's authority, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* give \w a|strong="H0116"\w* strong order, \w that|strong="H4430"\w* whoever makes any request \w to|strong="H5922"\w* any god \w or|strong="H4430"\w* man \w but|strong="H0116"\w* \w you|strong="H5922"\w*, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, \w for|strong="H5922"\w* thirty days, \w is|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* be put into \w the|strong="H0116"\w* lions' hole.

\w Now|strong="H4430"\w*, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, put \w the|strong="H3606"\w* order \w in|strong="H0426"\w* force, signing \w the|strong="H3606"\w* writing \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* it may not \w be|strong="H0426"\w* changed, like \w the|strong="H3606"\w* law \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Medes \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Persians \w which|strong="H1768"\w* may not come \w to|strong="H1156"\w* \w an|strong="H8631"\w* end.

\w For|strong="H1768"\w* this reason \w King|strong="H4430"\w* Darius put \w his|strong="H1768"\w* name on \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* order.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* Daniel, on hearing \w that|strong="H0633"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* been \w signed|strong="H7560"\w*, went into \w his|strong="H3606"\w* house; (\w now|strong="H4430"\w* he \w had|strong="H4430"\w* windows \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* room on \w the|strong="H3606"\w* roof opening \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* direction \w of|strong="H4430"\w* Jerusalem;) \w and|strong="H4430"\w* three times a day he went down on \w his|strong="H3606"\w* knees \w in|strong="H4430"\w* prayer \w and|strong="H4430"\w* praise \w before|strong="H6903"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* God, \w as|strong="H6903"\w* he \w had|strong="H4430"\w* done \w before|strong="H6903"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6903"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* men \w were|strong="H1934"\w* watching \w and|strong="H1005"\w* saw \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w making|strong="H3046"\w* prayers \w and|strong="H1005"\w* requesting grace \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w came|strong="H7284"\w* near \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* king \w and|strong="H1841"\w* said, O King, have you not put your name \w to|strong="H6925"\w* an order \w that|strong="H0116"\w* any \w man|strong="H1400"\w* who \w makes|strong="H1156"\w* \w a|strong="H7912"\w* \w request|strong="H1156"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* any \w god|strong="H0426"\w* \w or|strong="H0426"\w* \w man|strong="H1400"\w* \w but|strong="H0116"\w* you, O King, \w for|strong="H1156"\w* thirty days, \w is|strong="H0426"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* put into \w the|strong="H0116"\w* lions' hole? \w The|strong="H0116"\w* king \w made|strong="H1156"\w* answer \w and|strong="H1841"\w* said, \w The|strong="H0116"\w* thing \w is|strong="H0426"\w* fixed \w by|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* law \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Medes \w and|strong="H1841"\w* Persians which may not come \w to|strong="H6925"\w* an end.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w made|strong="H1156"\w* answer \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, Daniel, one \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* prisoners \w of|strong="H0426"\w* Judah, \w has|strong="H0426"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* respect \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, \w or|strong="H0426"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* order \w signed|strong="H7560"\w* \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w but|strong="H3861"\w* three times \w a|strong="H1156"\w* \w day|strong="H3118"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w makes|strong="H1156"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1768"\w* this thing came \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* king's ears, \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* very evil \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* heart \w was|strong="H1841"\w* fixed \w on|strong="H5922"\w* keeping \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* safe, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* till \w the|strong="H0116"\w* going down \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* sun \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* doing everything \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* power \w to|strong="H5922"\w* get \w him|strong="H6925"\w* free.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* these men said \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w Be|strong="H1934"\w* certain, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w by|strong="H7761"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* law \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Medes \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Persians no order \w or|strong="H4430"\w* law \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w has|strong="H1768"\w* put into force may \w be|strong="H1934"\w* changed.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w gave|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* order, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* took Daniel \w and|strong="H4430"\w* put \w him|strong="H6966"\w* into \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lions' hole. \w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* answer \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* Daniel, \w Your|strong="H5922"\w* God, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* servant \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w at|strong="H6966"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* times, \w will|strong="H1768"\w* keep \w you|strong="H1768"\w* safe.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* got \w a|strong="H0116"\w* stone \w and|strong="H6032"\w* put \w it|strong="H0607"\w* over \w the|strong="H0116"\w* mouth \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* hole, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w it|strong="H0607"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* stamped \w with|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* king's stamp \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w with|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* stamp \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* lords, \w so|strong="H0116"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* decision about \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* might not \w be|strong="H0426"\w* changed.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w went|strong="H0858"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* great house, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* took \w no|strong="H3809"\w* food \w that|strong="H1768"\w* night, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* ... \w were|strong="H1768"\w* placed before him, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* sleep \w went|strong="H0858"\w* \w from|strong="H8133"\w* him.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* very early \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* morning \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* got \w up|strong="H6925"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w went|strong="H0236"\w* quickly \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* lions' hole.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* came near \w the|strong="H0116"\w* hole \w where|strong="H1768"\w* Daniel \w was|strong="H4430"\w*, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* gave \w a|strong="H0116"\w* loud cry \w of|strong="H4430"\w* grief; \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H6966"\w* answer \w and|strong="H4430"\w* said \w to|strong="H4430"\w* Daniel, O Daniel, servant \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* living God, \w is|strong="H1768"\w* your God, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* servant \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w at|strong="H6966"\w* all times, able \w to|strong="H4430"\w* keep \w you|strong="H1768"\w* safe \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w lions|strong="H0744"\w*?

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, \w have|strong="H4430"\w* \w life|strong="H2417"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* ever.

My God \w has|strong="H4430"\w* sent his angel \w to|strong="H5974"\w* keep \w the|strong="H0116"\w* lions' mouths shut, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w have|strong="H4430"\w* done me no damage: because \w I|strong="H0116"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* seen \w to|strong="H5974"\w* be without sin before him; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* further, before you, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, \w I|strong="H0116"\w* \w have|strong="H4430"\w* done no wrong.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* very glad, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* gave orders \w for|strong="H1768"\w* them \w to|strong="H6925"\w* take Daniel \w up|strong="H6925"\w* \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* hole. \w So|strong="H1768"\w* Daniel \w was|strong="H4430"\w* taken \w up|strong="H6925"\w* \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* hole \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* seen \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* untouched, \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* faith \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w his|strong="H7972"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w at|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* king's order, \w they|strong="H0116"\w* took \w those|strong="H1768"\w* men \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* evil \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* put \w them|strong="H0560"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lions' hole, \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* wives \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* children; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* got \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* floor \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* hole before \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lions overcame \w them|strong="H0560"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* bones \w were|strong="H1768"\w* broken.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* Darius sent \w a|strong="H5705"\w* letter \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* peoples, nations, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* languages, living \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* earth: May your peace be increased.

It \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* order \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H1753"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* am ruler, men \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H5972"\w* be shaking with fear before \w the|strong="H3606"\w* God \w of|strong="H4430"\w* Daniel: \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w living|strong="H1753"\w* God, unchanging \w for|strong="H1768"\w* ever, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w is|strong="H1768"\w* one \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* never come \w to|strong="H5972"\w* destruction, \w his|strong="H3606"\w* rule \w will|strong="H1768"\w* go on \w to|strong="H5972"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* end.

\w He|strong="H1768"\w* gives salvation \w and|strong="H1763"\w* makes men free \w from|strong="H4481"\w* danger, \w and|strong="H1763"\w* \w does|strong="H1934"\w* signs \w and|strong="H1763"\w* wonders \w in|strong="H0426"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H1763"\w* earth, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w has|strong="H0426"\w* \w kept|strong="H1934"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* safe \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* power \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lions.

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* this \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* did well \w in|strong="H5338"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Darius \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w in|strong="H5338"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Cyrus \w the|strong="H1768"\w* Persian.
